ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Deity specific items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Usually they will not change items that are already in the game unless there s a horrendous balance problem (e.g. cleric mask that let them cast call of
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Apr 2000, Webber, Jessica wrote:
>
> Anyone hear any more on this? I check a bracer of Erollisi last night
> figuring if the change affected current items that that would surely be one
> of them. My agnostic rogue had no problem wearing it nor did it say
> anything about deity when I right clicked it.

Usually they will not change items that are already in the
game unless there's a horrendous balance problem (e.g. cleric
mask that let them cast call of bones, allowing them to lose
hp for accelerated mana regen, then use that mana to heal
themselves).

Course they also have a necro resurrection spell lined up for
the expansion so who knows...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
